name: iGNOP
description:
Game Engine - GameMaker: Studio 1.4...
Sound FX - bfxr.net 
Font - Visitor / dafont.com 
Graphics - Allan Grzicic
Coding - Allan Grzicic

1 or 2 players (local co-op or local versus)

---

v1.2.2 (Released September 14, 2017)
  • Added mouse support for Player 2
  • One more colour added to ball, paddle, and table markings (Style #9 under Settings)

---

v1.2.1 (Released August 25, 2017)

  • When mouse support enabled, left mouse button adds extra ball(s), right mouse button changes paddle colour
  • Added logos to table top, press 'x' to turn on/off/rotate (ServePingPong.com, Bruha.com)
  • Added one more table top style (ServePingPong.com)
  • Fix: obj_xlimit changes colour according to style chosen with black holes disabled

---

v1.2 (Released August 24, 2017)

  • Added option to enable/disable mouse support in-game (Player 1)
  • Added option to enable/disable black holes in-game
  • Added option to add extra ball(s) during current wave

---

v1.1 (Released August 9, 2017)

  • Added option to set dead zone of joystick axis via Settings (applies to both players)
  • Added option to change reaction time of enemy via Settings
  • Added option to change paddle and ball colors in-game
  • Extra colours for ball and table (playing surface)

---

v1.0.1 (Released August 7, 2017)
- Players can now change their paddle colours, could be helpful when playing local co-op
- During local co-op, players also have IDs above their paddles (e.g. Player 1 is P1)

---
